casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Timothy Alan HURST, BY AND THROUGH Christian P. CHERRY as Collector; Jeffery Wayne Henley a/k/a Jeffrey Wayne Henley; and Beverly Henley
v.
MOOREHEAD I, LLC; Cramer Mountain Development Company, LLC a/k/a Cramer Mountain Development LLC; Park West Premier Properties, LLC; Park West Investments, Inc. ; Park West-stone, LLC; Park West Development Company, Inc.; Cobblestone Builders, LLC; Frank Desimone a/k/a Frank Desimone ; Bruce B. Blackmon, Jr., a/k/a Bruce Blackmon a/k/a Bruce B. Blackman; Gregory A. Mascaro a/k/a Greg Mascaro No. 444P14 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018 Mr. William L. Mills, III, Concord, Attorney at Law, for Hurst, Timothy Alan (Estate of)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 8th of December 2014 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Cabarrus County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
